response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but we understand its worth extends beyond monetary terms to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. We believe this offer reflects the true value of the product while allowing you to secure it at a favorable rate. We look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a valued member of our community.", "product_price": 950000}
